channel.title: TorChat Updates
channel.description: Updates and news around the anonymous instant messenger TorChat

item.title: Version 0.9.9.109 is out
item.description: Version 0.9.9.109 is out. I have made some changes in the way and the order in which buddies on the list are connected. New in this version is support for a configuration file. You can now use an already running tor proxy in your network by specifying adress and port numbers (you mus also configure a hidden service on this proxy). Unfortubetely I hit the quota and am still waiting for Google to increase my limit until I can upload the windows binary.
